api_list.api_description: Set or delete a price alert for a specific game and price.

required_parameters.name: action
required_parameters.description: The action to take on the price alert ('set' or 'delete').

required_parameters.name: game_id
required_parameters.description: An existing gameID, required for 'set' and 'delete'.

optional_parameters.name: price
optional_parameters.description: The price to wait for, only required when using 'set' value for action parameter.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve a specific comic by number.

query: Can you set a price alert for a game with ID 59 for $14.99 using my email someone@example.org while at the same time fetch the XKCD comic number 614 for a little fun?
